ARCHE Suite documentation

Documentation for the ARCHE repository software stack

View the Project on GitHub acdh-oeaw/arche-docs

Introduction

  • What ARCHE Suite is and what it is not

  • Pretty extensive tour through the ARCHE Suite deployment

  • Paper from the CLARIN Annual Conference 2021 (doi https://doi.org/10.3384/9789179294441)

Technical Guides

  • Metadata API performance
  • Dissemination services
  • Parallel ingestion

Components

library links description developmentÂ status
arche-biblatex docs
github		 dissemination service mapping ARCHE metadata to BibLaTeX

arche-core docs
github		 ARCHE core code


arche-dashboard docs
github		 GUI providing ARCHE metadata statistics

arche-docker Docker Hub
github		 Docker image providing runtime environment for the ARCHE suite
arche-doorkeeper docs
github		 ACDH handlers plugged into the arche-core


arche-exif github EXIF dissemination service for ARCHE
arche-fcs docs
github		 CLARIN FCS endpoint for ARCHE

arche-gui docs
github		 Drupal 8 GUI for ARCHE

arche-iiifmanifest github IIIF manifest dissemination service for ARCHE
arche-ingest docs
github		 High-level CLI scripts for ARCHE ingestions.

arche-lib docs
github		 PHP bindings for the repository API (both REST and direct database access)


arche-lib-disserv docs
github		 arche-lib extention providing dissemination service features


arche-lib-ingest docs
github		 high-level PHP library for data ingestion (both metadata and binaries)


arche-lib-schema docs
github		 high-level representation of the repositoryâs ontology data


arche-mapserver docs
github		 WFS/WMS/WMTS dissemination service using Mapserver

arche-oaipmh docs
github		 OAI-PMH service for the ARCHE

arche-openrefine docs
github		 OpenRefine API service for the ARCHE

arche-ref-sources docs
github		 A library for enriching named entity metadata using external references sources (GND, VIAF, Geonames, etc.)

arche-resolver docs
github		 resolver for the ARCHE (a service providing ARCHE own PID service and redirection to correct dissemination services based on a requested response format)

arche-schema-ingest docs
github		 PHP library for ingesting ACDH ontology into the ARCHE


arche-thumbnails docs
github		 dissemination service generating ARCHE resourcesâ thumbnails

uriNormalizer docs
github		 library for nomalizing named entity URIs and fetching their RDF metadata
